title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra

Upgrade your everyday comfort with this wirefree plus-size bra featuring silky leopard satin style and reliable full coverage. Designed to support and smooth without wires, it’s made with a soft, stretchy blend and a wide, stabilizing band for a secure fit all day.

Key features:
- Sizes: 32C to 50DD.
- Wirefree support: Wide band plus hook-and-eye closures for a customized, stay-put fit.
- Full coverage cups for shape and confidence under tees and blouses.
- Front-adjustable straps for quick, easy fine-tuning.
- Material: 90% nylon / 10% spandex for softness, stretch, and breathability.
- Patterns and colors: Leopard print satin plus essentials like white, nude, and other select colors.
- Pack contents: 1 bra; includes a satin leopard option.

Why you’ll love it:
- Comfortable, no-wire lift that doesn’t dig or pinch.
- Smoothing coverage that disappears under clothing.
- Front-adjustable straps make on-the-go tweaks simple.
- Versatile colors and a fun leopard print to match your mood and wardrobe.

Care:
- Hand wash cold; line dry to preserve shape and satin finish.

Ideal for everyday wear, work, or weekends, this Just My Size wirefree bra blends support, style, and comfort—especially for fuller busts seeking a polished, no-wire fit.
